com.netflix.spectator.impl

Class AtomicDouble

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • com.netflix.spectator.impl.AtomicDouble
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class AtomicDouble
extends Number
    Wrapper around AtomicLong to make working with double values easier.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
